item.title: 6.0 Release Notes | Npgsql Documentation
item.description: The release candidate of Npgsql Entity Framework Core provider version 6.0 has been released and is available on nuget. This version works with version 6.0 of Entity Framework Core, and brings new Npgsql features in addition to the general EF Core changes.

item.title: The case of the UWP application that crashes at launch on Windows 10X
item.description: Application compatibility testing for Windows 10X identified a program that crashed at launch. We were able to obtain a time travel trace for the application. Let’s do some application compatibility debugging. Even though the Windows 10X project has been shelved, there’s still a lesson here for other non-Desktop platforms,
item.author: (Raymond Chen)
